name: Christian Theobalt [INF]
content: Christian Theobalt :: MPI Informatik max planck institut informatik Prof. Dr. Christian Theobalt Director - Visual Computing and AI Department at MPI for Informatics Professor of Computer Science - Saarland University Director - Saarbruecken Center for Visual Computing, Interacton and Artificial Intelligence Mailing Address: MPI Informatik Saarland Informatics Campus Campus E 1.4 - Office 224 66123 Saarbruecken Germany Email: theobalt [at] mpi-inf dot mpg dot de Assistants: Sabine Budde Phone: +49 (0)681 9325-4500 Fax: +49 (0)681 9325-4599 Research Interests Please find a description of the research in our department here.
